name: VibeSpeed
description:
Simple Speedrunning game inspired by Minima by Icoso. Make sure to take a screenshot before hitting the final platform or record your run. I made this in about a day and a half ish.

Controls

WASD/Arrows=Movement

Space=Jump

Return/Enter=Reset

Check me out on Youtube! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq5k3rhpc49hcCB-i58jSdQ

Check out the artist on Youtube! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg5cjZQmpZdbpl2HGkUeSWA
